SlideBody.Heading: Embedding APIs
SlideBody.List:
Services available to embedding applications: nsPref service - preferences and setup. We will publish public pref strings.
nsObserver service - observing global "topics" We wil publish public observer topics.
nsURILoader, nsUnknownContentHandler services - dealing with embedding application-specific protocols and content types.
nsProfileManager service - managing user profiles.
nsMemory service - managing memory returned from the component.
nsCookie service - cookie management.
